DOC.brief_summary: The aim investigate development overweight obesity infancy school age , evaluate intervention prevent development overweight obesity among child . A follow-up study conduct 267 child allow comparison child develop overweight one . Subjects requite 10 year age previous project . These child study 6-18 month old follow-up conduct 4 year age . Sixteen percent child overweight 4 year age retrospective data e.g . food intake , blood lipid anthropometric measurement exist . In present follow-up data regard food physical activity habit , anthropometric measurement blood sample e.g . blood lipid , IGF1 collect . An intervention study conduct 80-120 overweight child randomize one intervention one control group . An intervention two year encourage long term healthy habit regard diet physical activity group meeting supervision . Information food habit collect questionnaire , interview diary . Measurement physical activity energy expenditure make Sense Wear double label water , use validate report food intake . Further , anthropometric measurement blood sample collect .
